content.en: Multimodal image fusion: Researchers have explored various algorithms to improve the fusion of different types of medical images, such as CT and MR images. These algorithms, such as wavelet transform-based fusion approach and wavelet-based image fusion algorithm, aim to enhance the analysis of multimodality medical images. Other approaches, like the human visual system-inspired fusion framework and the nonsubsampled contourlet transform-based fusion approach, have also been investigated to improve the fusion of these images.
content.da: Multimodal billedfusion: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre fusionen af forskellige typer medicinske billeder, såsom CT og MR billeder. Disse algoritmer, som bølgeforvandlingsbaseret fusionsmetode og bølgeforvandlingsbaseret billedfusionsalgoritme, sigter på at forbedre analysen af multimodalitetsmedicinske billeder. Andre tilgange, såsom det menneskelige visuelle system-inspirerede fusionsrammeværk og den ikke-samplede konturforvandlingsbaserede fusionsmetode, er også blevet undersøgt for at forbedre fusionen af disse billeder.
